properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 4:47AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Alcovy River near High Point affecting Newton County


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Alcovy River near High Point.
* From early Wednesday morning until further notice.
* At 430 AM Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet...and rising.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* At 11 feet...Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of
woodlands and fields near the river upstream and downstream from
the gage on Henderson Mill Road. The water level reaches the first
wooden step behind an elevated private residence just upstream and
on the left bank from the bridge.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
